医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
罗格斯大学的科学家发现肺部第一个脂质血管“邮政编码”新泽西罗格斯癌症研究所和新泽西罗格斯医学院 (NJMS) 的研究人员与其他合作小组一起，发现了肺部第一个脂质血管“邮政编码”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Rutgers-scientists-discover-first-lipid-angio-zip-code-in-the-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Rutgers-scientists-discover-first-lipid-angio-zip-code-in-the-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=473cd494-2f5f-46ac-a605-282714e684a8 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 02:05:22 -0400 Rutgers scientists discover first lipid vascular 'zip code' in the lungs
良好的心肺健康可以预防男性患 9 种癌症年轻时良好的心肺健康与日后患 9 种特定癌症的风险降低 40% 相关；至少在男性中——；英国运动医学杂志在线发表的一项大型长期研究表明。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/High-cardiorespiratory-fitness-may-protect-against-9-types-of-cancer-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/High-cardiorespiratory-fitness-may-protect-against-9-types-of-cancer-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6180c0d-268f-4372-a820-38813d7162fb Wed, 16 Aug 2023 01:50:54 -0400 High cardiorespiratory fitness may protect against 9 types of cancer in men
UCF研究人员获得340万美元用于开发治疗结核病的新型抗生素医学院的一名研究人员正在开发一种与青霉素相关的新型抗生素，用于治疗结核病 (TB) 和相关肺部感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/UCF-researcher-receives-2434-million-to-develop-new-antibiotic-to-treat-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/UCF-researcher-receives-2434-million-to-develop-new-antibiotic-to-treat-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a4a8432-1f04-4847-90f5-bdb5cc7fc26c Wed, 16 Aug 2023 01:40:24 -0400 UCF researcher receives $3.4 million to develop new antibiotic to treat tuberculosis
天然生物活性分子可以缓解感冒和流感症状应用生物实验室公司的研究人员发现天然生物活性分子如何通过保护粘膜屏障功能并减少感染期间的炎症来有效缓解感冒和流感症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Natural-bioactive-molecules-can-relieve-cold-and-flu-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Natural-bioactive-molecules-can-relieve-cold-and-flu-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17a759d8-3f34-4c24-8c66-fcd1b0766d66 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 01:23:26 -0400 Natural bioactive molecules can relieve cold and flu symptoms
巴西研究人员提出一种自闭症谱系障碍的定量诊断方法由于涉及的复杂程度，诊断自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 仍然是一项艰巨的挑战，需要高度专业化的专业人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Brazilian-researchers-propose-a-quantitative-diagnostic-method-for-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Brazilian-researchers-propose-a-quantitative-diagnostic-method-for-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc8eda13-4219-49b0-888d-381258d4d735 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 01:06:18 -0400 Brazilian researchers propose a quantitative diagnostic method for autism spectrum disorder
凯斯勒基金会研究人员获得 170 万美元赠款，用于改善 TBI 患者的生活凯斯勒基金会的科学家获得了新泽西州脑损伤研究委员会的四项资助，总额近 170 万美元，用于基于各种旨在改善创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 患者生活的新颖方法的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Kessler-Foundation-researchers-receive-2417-million-in-grants-to-improve-lives-of-TBI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Kessler-Foundation-researchers-receive-2417-million-in-grants-to-improve-lives-of-TBI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be4a2aba-f53e-4c2a-9e5f-705a84316f52 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 23:22:00 -0400 Kessler Foundation researchers receive $1.7 million in grants to improve lives of TBI patients
科学家发现与黑人男性转移性前列腺癌相关的潜在生物标志物City of Hope 是美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，也是糖尿病和其他危及生命的疾病的领先研究中心，其科学家们在患有糖尿病和转移性前列腺癌的男性中发现了一种细胞代谢过程，该过程可以总有一天会改进对患有这些疾病的黑人的检测和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Scientists-discover-pottial-biomarkers-linked-to-metastatic-prostate-cancer-in-Black-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Scientists-discover-pottial-biomarkers-linked-to-metastatic-prostate-cancer-in-Black-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6c66f8b-7d11-4b24-b52e-15640db48279 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 23:02:53 -0400 Scientists discover potential biomarkers linked to metastatic prostate cancer in Black men
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 授予数百万美元拨款，用于开发糖尿病足溃疡的先进治疗方法来自寺崎生物医学创新研究所 (TIBI) 和内布拉斯加大学医学中心 (UNMC) 的研究团队获得了美国国立卫生研究院的数百万美元拨款，用于开发一种卓越的、多管齐下的糖尿病伤口治疗方法足部溃疡（DFU）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Multimillion-dollar-NIH-grant-awarded-to-develop-advanced-treatment-for-diabetic-foot-ulcers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Multimillion-dollar-NIH-grant-awarded-to-develop-advanced-treatment-for-diabetic-foot-ulcers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=769987cf-32de-4c2f-953e-67a8d7981229 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 22:56:21 -0400 Multimillion-dollar NIH grant awarded to develop advanced treatment for diabetic foot ulcers
极端高温会加剧弱势群体的认知能力下降2023 年 7 月是有记录以来最热的一个月，凤凰城等城市连续几周经历破纪录的热浪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Extreme-heat-can-worsen-cognitive-decline-among-vulnerable-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Extreme-heat-can-worsen-cognitive-decline-among-vulnerable-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffdf1b2a-57a1-44da-9431-8578154ed14f Tue, 15 Aug 2023 22:53:17 -0400 Extreme heat can worsen cognitive decline among vulnerable groups
使用新的“多样性指数”评估医学研究可以促进更好的健康结果科学期刊和研究论文通过称为“影响因子”的指标进行评估，该指标基于某篇论文被其他论文引用的次数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Evaluating-medical-research-using-a-new-e2809cdiversity-indexe2809d-could-promote-better-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Evaluating-medical-research-using-a-new-e2809cdiversity-indexe2809d-could-promote-better-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=293881b0-1deb-4aba-b793-cd799bc48737 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 22:36:36 -0400 Evaluating medical research using a new “diversity index” could promote better health outcomes
